00015 class MIXIM_API ChannelState
00016 {
00017 protected:
00018 
00020   bool idle;
00021 
00023   double rssi;
00024 public:
00025 
00033   ChannelState(bool isIdle = false, double rssi = 0.0) :
00034     idle(isIdle), rssi(rssi) {}
00035 
00040   bool isIdle() const;
00041 
00045   double getRSSI() const;
00046 
00052   std::string info() const {
00053     std::stringstream os;
00054     if (idle) {
00055       os << "[idle with rssi of ";
00056     } else {
00057       os << "[busy with rssi of ";
00058     }
00059     os << rssi << "]";
00060     return os.str();
00061   }
00062 };
